question: Which among the following is the correct designation of Hindi in India?
option2: Language of communication between states & centre
option3: The Official Language of the Union of India
option4: Official and National Language of India
answer: The Official Language of the Union of India
explanation: According to Article 343 (1) of the Constitution of India Hindi in Devanagari script is the official language of the Union of India. However, use of English for official purposes was also made possible by same article.
